name: AccountCustomFields_PutAccountCustomFields
description: This method updates an existing account custom field.

accountId.description: The external account number (int) or account ID GUID.

customFieldId.description: The ID of the custom field.

customField.description: This object provides details about a custom field.

customFieldType.description:
The type of custom field. Valid values are:

- `text` (default)
- `list`

fieldId.description: The ID of the custom field.

listItems.description:
For a list custom field, this is an array of strings that represent the items in a list. 

Maximum Length: 2,000 characters.

name.description: The name of the custom field.

required.description: When **true,** the signer must complete the custom field.

show.description: When **true,** the custom field displays at the top of the Certificate of Completion.

value.description:
Specifies the value of the custom field. 

Maximum Length: 2,000 characters.

customField.x-ms-summary: This object provides details about a custom field.

errorDetails.description: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

errorCode.description: The code associated with the error condition.

message.description: A brief message describing the error condition.

errorDetails.x-ms-summary: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

$block:
An `accountCustomField` is an envelope custom field that you set at the account level.
Applying custom fields enables account administrators to group and manage envelopes.

$ul: **listCustomFields**: An array of list custom fields.
**textCustomFields**: An array of text custom fields.

$block: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

$ul: **errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
